Banner.title: Expert Online Tutors for IB and IGCSE Exams, Essays and Assesments
Banner.description: Expert coaching for Extended Essays, Internal Assessments, and exam preparation in Mathematics, Biology, Physics, and more. Learn anywhere, anytime!

Pricing.title: IB & IGCSE Tutoring Plans Personalized for Your Success
Pricing.description: Choose the perfect IB or IGCSE tutoring plan: personalized one-on-one sessions, 10-class packages, or 20-class intensive programs. Tailored study plans to help you excel in your exams.

List.4: Access to a free review class

GroupClass.title: Affordable Learning with IB & IGCSE Group Classes
GroupClass.description: Join our group classes tailored for IB and IGCSE students. Study in a collaborative environment, exchange strategies with peers, and prepare for your exams in a dynamic and engaging way.

Coaching.title: Expert Coaching for IB Extended Essays & Internal Assessments
Coaching.description: Submit your Extended Essay and Internal Assessment projects for expert feedback. Get personalized guidance to excel in your assessments and achieve top results.

About.title: About Learning Spark
About.description1: We get it—preparing for those international exams can be seriously tough and stressful. But guess what? We're here to tell you that we've got your back, and
About.description1span: we're all about helping you unleash your full potential.
About.description2: Our team of specialized tutors is dedicated to making this journey enjoyable and effortless.
About.description2span: Join our tailored classes in English or Spanish, designed for IB (International Baccalaureate) and IGCSE exam success.
About.description2End: We provide top-notch tutoring, customized for these demanding programs, offering personalized guidance every step of the way. Let's embark on an exciting learning journey together!

Contact.title: Contact us
Contact.description: Do you have any questions or concerns? Don’t see the subject you want? Send us your message, and we’ll get back to you very soon.

ResoursesPage.title: Study Resources for IB & IGCSE
ResoursesPage.description: Find subject-specific materials to enhance your exam preparation, extended essays, and internal assessments. Access guides, exercises, and key tools to study efficiently at your own pace.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist

name.minLength: Name must be at least 3 characters long

password.minLength: Password must be at least 5 characters long
password.pattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
